main event: A sighting of unidentified flying objects occurred on July 12, 1955, observed by a civilian group.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for one hour,The object appeared to oscillate and drift,Two fighter jets intercepted the objects,The objects were later identified as unusual double balloons,An interesting detail includes the altitude and speed of the object being approximately 32,000 feet and traveling about 20 knots.
sighted object: one or possibly two oscillating objects with tails
